file.name: zuzul-product-private.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: zuzul-product-private
  description: API for services product-private
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:7940'
paths:
  #FINISHED
  /zuzul-product-private/v1/pub/image/{prd-id}/{img-id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - A image of a product
      description: 'Get image of a product'
      responses:
        404:
          description: Not found
        200:
          content:
            image/*: # Media type
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
          description: Found
  #FINISHED
  /zuzul-product-private/v1/pub/product/{prd-id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Get product by id
      description: 'Get detail of product'
      responses:
        404:
          description: Not found
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  prdId:
                    type: string
                  prdUserId:
                    type: string
                  prdName:
                    type: string
                  prdCateId:
                    type: string
                  prdSubId:
                    type: string
                  prdPriceOrigin:
                    type: integer
                  prdLongDes:
                    type: string
                  prdImages:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                  prdDateExpiry:
                    type: integer
                  prdMonthWarranty:
                    type: integer
                  prdReact:
                    type: integer
                  prdDateCreate:
                    type: integer
                  imageUser:
                    type: string
                  userId:
                    type: string
                  userName:
                    type: string
          description: Found
  #TODO:
  /zuzul-product-private/v1/pub/product/type?filter:
    get:
      tags:
        - Get a lot of products by filter
      description: 'Get detail of product'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get list product filter by
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    prdId:
                      type: string
                    prdName:
                      type: string
                    prdPriceOrigin:
                      type: string
                    prdImage:
                      type: string
                    prdShortDes:
                      type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /zuzul-product-private/v1/pub/product/{prd-id}: get: parse path: path parameter not specified: "prd-id"
